author: costin
msg: - Fixed Exec and Cvs. If you disagree with those tasks we can move
them in a separate directory, but please leave them in Ant for a while.
- Added task Ant.java that will call ant for a sub-pacakge.
- Added main.xml - this will be the main driver for nightly builds.

author: costin
msg: - Added a new task to call Ant in a subproject.
- allow user to set basedir in command line
( usefull if you run ant from crontab and you want to avoid cds )

author: rubys
msg: Allow JDK 1.1.X classes.zip file to be placed in front of the JDK 1.2 javac.jar

author: rubys
msg: "Borrow" some Windows specific path cleanup logic from
